app.installation_instructions:
For Zendesk Chat

1. Create an agent in your Zendesk account for your chatbot.
2. Go to your chatbot on TomBot, add your Zendesk subdomain and use your newly created Zendesk agent user
3.  Connect your chatbot with your Zendesk Chat Widget.
4. For full instructions, please email support@tombot.ai.
